title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park          Volunteer Opportunities Eisenhower NHS relies on volunteers to assist the park staff in presenting programs to the public and to maintain the upkeep of buildings, grounds, artifacts, and research materials. A variety of volunteer opportunities are available. more... Internships Twelve week interpretive and curatorial internships are available for the 2016 spring and summer seasons. Stipends and housing are provided. more... Donations Eisenhower NHS welcomes donations to assist in our efforts to preserve the site, make acquisitions for the museum collection, and support our education programs. more...
